Trigger.Name: Uznair
Trigger.RegularExpression: A portal into Uznair has appeared.

Trigger.Name: porte
Trigger.RegularExpression: (A portal has appeared|chamber opens|Chamber is open)

Trigger.Name: usciti
Trigger.RegularExpression: (A trap is triggered! You are expelled from the canals!|You are devoured by an Atomos asipu and wake far from the altars.|You are expelled from the area!|You are devoured by a secret sweeper and wake far from the sanctum)

Trigger.Name: special mob
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Keeper of the Keys appears|Fuath tricksters appear|A Fuath trickster appears

Trigger.Name: Magicite
Trigger.RegularExpression: The party obtains a splinter of (elder|Crag|Inferno|Vortex) magicite.

Trigger.Name: Stone
Trigger.RegularExpression: recovers from the effect of Stone Curse.

Trigger.Name: chimera dentro
Trigger.RegularExpression: The heavenly mukai-inu begins casting The Dragon's Voice

Trigger.Name: chimera distante
Trigger.RegularExpression: The heavenly mukai-inu begins casting The Ram's Voice

Trigger.Name: sacchettino
Trigger.RegularExpression: You sense the Accursed Hoard calling you

Trigger.Name: Boss finale - occhio
Trigger.RegularExpression: Hrodric Poisontongue readies Eye of the Fire.

Trigger.Name: King Thordan begins casting The Dragon's Gaze.
Trigger.RegularExpression: King Thordan begins casting The Dragon's Gaze.

Trigger.Name: Holiest of Holy
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ser Adelphel readies Holiest of Holy

Trigger.Name: Ancient Quaga
Trigger.RegularExpression: King Thordan begins casting Ancient Quaga

Trigger.Name: Divine Right
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ser Janlenoux begins casting Divine Right

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Make your way to the back

Trigger.Name: Ravana readies The Rose of Hate
Trigger.RegularExpression: Ravana readies The Rose of Hate

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: get close and use the action!

Trigger.Name: tank buster
Trigger.RegularExpression: Lakshmi readies The Pull of Light.

Trigger.Name: stack
Trigger.RegularExpression: Lakshmi readies The Pall of Light.

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: stay away and use the action!

Trigger.Name: party pronto
Trigger.RegularExpression: Party recruitment ended. All places have been filled.

Trigger.Name: mount
Trigger.RegularExpression: (whistle|kamuy fife|trumpet) has been added to the loot list

Trigger.Name: Echo
Trigger.RegularExpression: Maximum HP, damage dealt, and spell-based HP restoration have been increased by (5|10|15|20|25|30)%

Trigger.Name: Spectral current
Trigger.RegularExpression: ( pulled out of the water! Here comes a spectral current|to thank for this spectral current! No one's going home hungry tonight|fished up Lady Luck herself! Here comes a spectral current)

Trigger.Name: Intuition
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of *Fisher's Intuition

Trigger.Name: Delfini GP
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of *Cetaceous Speed

Trigger.Name: Delfini Corrente
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of *Aurora Flipper
